section.61: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:That Allah's Messenger (ï·º) came to her in a happy mood with his features glittering with joy, and said, "Have you not heard what the Qaif has said about Zaid and Us-ama? He saw their feet and remarked. These belong to each other." (i.e. They are father and son)
